title: [Mac] In-game freezes when mouse is not moving.
body:
Since the 7.1 patch, there has been constant in-game freezes when mouse is not moving.

It seems like that there is a solution for a newer Mac or Macbook users, which is un-checking the  "Shake Mouse pointer to locate" in Accessibility.

However, my macbook, which is OS X 10.9.5, does not have the "Shake Mouse pointer to locate" option to un-check.

I cannot understand why Riot has not solved this issue for Mac users. Not sure whether Riot is intentionally disregarding this issue which is occurring only in Mac, or really does not know about this issue. 

Please this this problem. I am sure there are many users who play or will play League on a Mac or Macbook.

Thank you,

replies.body: My first suggestion would be to check the shake mouse pointer, but there could be another cause since your OS doesn't have that.  The issue may be isolated to your OS and not League, so it's a bit unfair to suggest that we're disregarding it.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will look into this with you individually.  We'll help figure out why your game is freezing and look for some options.  We'll get back to you!

I were able to log into my Support, and just submitted a support ticket. Please do not disregard this issue. 

This issue has come up almost 3 months ago.

Thank you,

Thanks for your response. As I said before, there is no "Shake Mouse pointer to locate" to check or un-check. 

There were no such in-game freezes before the 7.1 patch. I have been playing league a couple of years, and never had a problem playing this game. This issue has started occurring since the 7.1 patch. 

It is very likely that Riot did something wrong with the 7.1 patch, and have not found a solution for this problem yet. I am not the only one who has this in-game freezes. Please search this issue in Boards, and you will see many people complaining about this problem.

I tried to submit a ticket, but I can't log into Riot Games Support. After entering in my account and password, it says:

"To log in, you must have a League of Legends account with a verified email address. We sent you an email with a link to verify your address. If you don't receive the email in the next few minutes, check out our FAQ".

Thank you very much,
And this is still not fixed. Four months and counting. Really?
